body_content.explanation: abbreviation for acute respiratory distress syndrome: a very serious medical condition in which a person's lungs cannot provide enough oxygen to their body:
examples: The purpose of this study was to demonstrate whether these treatments might reduce mortality in patients with severe ARDS.
ARDS is usually a complication of a serious existing health condition.
Since 2017, nine infants who have developed an ARDS have been referred to our unit.
